note: Just moved here from Mastodon.lol which is unfortunately closing down. I'm a retired costume designer and Associate Professor in Theater and Speech. I worked mostly in markers and colored pencils and am now exploring the media I didn't use back then. I'm interested in lots of things: history, languages, art, anything medieval, petroglyphs, reading, genealogy; basically a magpie. Oh, and I'm gay and an atheist.
